summary: An ordinance authorizing the mayor and the city comptroller to purchase five thousand dollars ($5,000) City of Tacoma General Obligation 5's due June 1, 1931, at 103.04 and accrued interest; and four thousand dollars ($4,000) City of Seattle General Obligation 4 1/2's due March 1, 1930 at 100.55 and accrued interst; and appropriating therefor nine thousand four hundred dollars ($9,400) or as much thereof as may be necessary from the Water Bonds Sinking Fund.
